product_summary: **QueryGPT** is a tool that allows you to QnA with OpenAI GPT models on Personal \ Business data using Embeddings and Completion. This project is inspired by 'knowledge base' from trainmy.ai.
product_pros: No need to convert text files to JSON/JSONL
Can be used with any text file
Can be used for a variety of tasks
product_cons: Can be difficult to set up
Not as accurate as some other tools

product_usecases.details: QueryGPT can be used to answer customer questions quickly and efficiently.
QueryGPT can be used to provide technical support to customers.
QueryGPT can be used to generate marketing content, such as product descriptions and blog posts.
QueryGPT can be used to create educational content, such as tutorials and presentations.
QueryGPT can be used to conduct research and development on new products and services.

product_toolfor.details: QueryGPT can be used by developers to create more powerful and efficient applications.
QueryGPT can be used by businesses to improve their customer service, technical support, and sales and marketing efforts.
QueryGPT can be used by educators to create more engaging and effective learning experiences.
QueryGPT can be used by researchers to conduct more in-depth and comprehensive research.
QueryGPT can be used by anyone who wants to learn more about a particular topic or who needs help with a specific task.
